output_summary.title: AUTOMOBILE WARRANTY CERTIFICATE
claimable_items: Engine Assembly, Transmission System, Cooling System, Fuel Injection System, Electrical System, Air Conditioning & Heating Unit, Suspension Components, Steering System, Brake System
Reasoning: These components are explicitly listed as being covered under the warranty.
non_claimable_items: Tires, Brake Pads, Clutch Plates, Battery (after 12 months from purchase), Headlights, Bulbs, Fuses, Upholstery, Carpets, Interior Trims, Paint Damage, Scratches and Rust caused by external factors, Accidental Damage, Fire, Flood or Theft, Damage caused by Unauthorized Modifications or Racing Activities
Reasoning: These components are explicitly listed as not being covered under the warranty.
